title: Sapphire eSports recruitment
body:
Sapphire eSports is a new organisation looking to recruit talented LoL players to demonstrate their abilities in the coming Oceanic Open Ladder. Sapphire eSports, formally known as Tyrant eSports Club is looking to improve and strengthen the OOL roster of "Draxx", "EvilHag", "ecotoxic" and "Kardenl" by re-trialling all positions and forming the best team possible! 

Requirements
- Access and use to a Mic and TS3
- Willingness to learn and adapt
- Willing to develop as a player
- Seeking to play LoL at a competitive level
- Attendance of practice/tournaments throughout the week

Preferred
- Master/Challenger tier
- Fluent and clear communication (English)
- Competitive Experience

All positions will be trialled, with an emphasis on Junglers and Mid laners.

Think you got what it takes? Hit me up in game "Glacial" and fill out the attached form.

http://imgur.com/ZUFIV6C
